Text: subs are so much better than dubs... does anyone know where i can download subs?? i've checked all the sub sites i could find.
this film was orginally shot in english! the dub is the spanish track.
To get english instead of spanish in this movie on my Macintosh, I used VLC to play it back and did Audio menu > Audio Track, and chose the *second* instance of "Audio" in the submenu.
